scripts.test:env: node -e "console.log('Environment variables loaded:', Object.keys(process.env).filter(k => k.includes('IMAGE') || k.includes('CACHE') || k.includes('PORT')).map(k => `${k}=${process.env[k]}`).join(', '))"
scripts.env:check: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment:'); console.log('PORT:', process.env.PORT || 5930); console.log('IMAGE_FORMAT:', process.env.IMAGE_FORMAT || 'png'); console.log('CACHE_MAX_AGE:', process.env.CACHE_MAX_AGE || 31536000); console.log('MAX_IMAGE_DIMENSION:', process.env.MAX_IMAGE_DIMENSION || 5000);"
